longBusinessSummary: LatAmGrowth SPAC does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, share purchase, asset acquisition, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus its search for an initial business combination on businesses in Latin America or Hispanic-owned businesses in the United States. LatAmGrowth SPAC was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
